titleStmt.title: The oath of every free-man of the city of London
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to this honourable city,

notesStmt.note: Title of second sheet: Instructions for every free-man of the city of London.
"You shall sweare, that ye shall be true and faithfull to the Common-wealth of England; and in"--first three lines of text.
Copy torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
